articles.author: CNBCTV18.com
articles.title: Sensex @ 1,00,000 eminently achievable on 5-year view: Jefferies' Christopher Wood - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Christopher Wood of Jefferies wrote in his Greed & Fear note that the target of 1,00,000 for the S&P BSE Sensex is now eminently achievable. He said the target is on the assumption of 15 percent EPS growth on a five-year view.
